#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int n,x;
	cin>>x>>n;
	int i,wt[n],val[n],j;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	cin>>wt[i]>>val[i];
	long int a[n+1][x+1];
	for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=x;j++)
		{
			if(i==0||j==0)
			a[i][j]=0;
			else if(wt[i-1]>j)
			a[i][j]=a[i-1][j];
			else 
			{
				a[i][j]=max(a[i-1][j],val[i-1]+a[i-1][j-wt[i-1]]);
			}
		}
	}
	cout<<a[n][x];
}
